net.sourceforge.JDash
Class Setup

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.JDash.Setup

public class Setup
extends java.lang.Object

This class will allow the user to load, modify and save the setup for this JDash program. Setup information is saved in a properties file located in the running directory. At creation, this class will load all offline configuration values, and setup the system environment to run the JDash. At a minimum, all that is needed is to load this class. Almost all system variable values are retreived from the instance of this class. The monitir, logger, etc are all fetched via this class. Call the getSetup() method to get the setup instance.

public boolean isNew()
Return true if this config file is new, and not yet saved to it's external file.

loadConfigFile

public boolean loadConfigFile()
                       throws java.lang.Exception
This method will load the setup config file into memory. Overwritting any currently set values.

Returns:
true if the file was loaded, false if it was not

java.lang.Exception
